## 1.1. Decision Tree on the Iris Dataset

```{r}
library("rpart")
library("rpart.plot")
iris.df = data.frame(iris)
#iris.df
model <- rpart(Species ~ Sepal.Length + Sepal.Width + Petal.Length, data = iris.df, method = "class")
rpart.plot(model, extra=104, fallen.leaves=T, type=4, main="Iris Dataset Decision Tree")
```
